entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 26.
